osu.title: osu! skin
osu.description: Includes osu! and an extra gamemode of your choice.

osu.title: Additional gameplay variant
osu.description: I'll make a variant of the skin for a specific playstyle (DT, HD, etc).

osu.title: Make your skin private
osu.description: Having a private skin means i'll only share it with you and won't be published anywhere.

tourney.title: Animated Tournament Backgrounds
tourney.description: Animated backgrounds for the tourney client.

tourney.title: Tournament Skin
tourney.description: Gameplay Only Skin for tournament streaming.

tourney.title: All Tournament Designs
tourney.description: Includes banners, all animated tourney backgrounds, and the skin.

twitch.title: Profile Banner
twitch.description: Includes various Aspect Ratios so it can be used on other platforms.

twitch.title: Basic Stream Overlay
twitch.description: Includes 3 OBS Scenes, Basic Chat and Alerts, And no Transitions.

twitch.title: Advanced Stream Overlay
twitch.description: Includes 4 OBS Scenes, Custom Chat and Alerts, And basic Transitions.

twitch.title: Pro Stream Overlay
twitch.description: Includes 6 OBS Scenes, Custom Chat and Alerts, And Detailed Transitions.
